name: Tap the Asteroids Pro
description:
Planet Earth is in danger. A dangerous rain of asteroids threatens to destroy our planet. Tap the asteroids before they hit the Earth to destroy them. They will increase their speed making the game harder as time goes on. Be careful, don't tap the friendly spaceships.

Have Fun!

MAIN FEATURES

• Easy to play, hard to master
• 3 levels of difficulty: Slow, Normal and Fast
• Game Center support with 6 leaderboards
• Universal App, full native support for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch
